task.title: Refinish The Platen Roller
task.shortdesc: You can refinish your typewriter platen by wrapping the platen roller in heat-shrink tubing.

step.cmd: Unwrap and open your heat shrink tubing.
Measure the length of the platen roller and add 1 inch to the obtained measurement.
Cut a piece of heat shrink tubing to your desired length.

step.note: Ensure the platen is centered in the heat-shrink tubing length-wise.
step.cmd: Insert the platen roller into the heat shrink tubing.
Use a heat gun to apply heat to the heat shrink tubing surface until it has fully adhered to the platen roller.
Follow the steps in the section titled "Insert the Platen Roller" to insert the newly refinished platen roller into your typewriter.
